item.title: Two dead as Mexican Navy ship crashes into Brooklyn Bridge
item.description: At least 19 people are injured after the towering masts of training sailboat clip New York City's famous bridge.

item.title: Fatal blast near Palm Springs fertility clinic 'act of terrorism' - FBI
item.description: One person was killed and four injured in Saturday's explosion outside the American Reproductive Centers.

item.title: India's forgotten actor who lost her legacy to caste oppression
item.description: PK Rosy, the first actress in Malayalam cinema, was hounded out of her home after playing the role of an upper caste woman.

item.title: Pop culture re-invented the Menendez brothers - but can it set them free?
item.description: The brothers' fate will now be in the hands of California's Parole Board and Governor Gavin Newsom.

item.title: Four days that took India and Pakistan to the brink
item.description: The BBC visits families in Kashmir devastated by the deadliest clashes in years, and speaks to military insiders.
